name: Hide Option for Ozh's Admin Drop Down Menu
author: Greenweb

sections.description:
Only use this plugin if you already have Ozh’s Admin Drop Down Menu installed.

Ozh’s Admin Drop Down Menu is a great ui option
But it should be an option that does not effect every author, editor and admin on a website

If you like this plug-in please give it a five star rating, blog about it, Tweet about it and tell your WordPress friends.
sections.installation:
Use wordpress’ built in plugin installer

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I turn off the menu

  1. Navigate to your wordpress Edit My Profile page in the admin area
  2. Scroll Down to the bottom of the page and you’ll see the Hide Ozh’s Admin Drop Down Menu checkbox
  3. Check it and click the Update Profile button.
sections.changelog:
0.3.1

0.3

  • changed update_usermeta to update_user_meta
  • minor change to ensure compatibility with WP 3.5

0.2

  • changed the about URI

short_description: Gives your users the ability to turn off Ozh's Admin Drop Down Menu in their profile
